channel.title: Kafe on Rusos.net - Русскоговорящие в Уругвае
channel.description: Recent content in Kafe on Rusos.net - Русскоговорящие в Уругвае

item.title: Enriqueta
item.description: Igrali tut v nastolki. Yestj stolyi vnutri i na ulice. Kukhnya otkryivayetsya posle 20. Obyichno mnogo naroda i nuzhno bronirovatj.

item.title: Sushi Wok Perú
item.description: Na vkhode stoit lama. Ochenj vkusnyij i simpatichnyij restoran kstati. Lyudi v nyom rabotayut ochenj priyatnyiye. Seviche ne berite. Nu ili tak - siljno na lyubitelya. Kislyatina nevozmozhnaya.
